Question
========
If you want a high-level overview of R before installing it, which unit should you read first?

Answerlist
----------
* Introduction to R
* R Packages
* R tidyverse, tidymodels and more
* Further R Resources

Solution
========
The “Introduction to R” unit gives the high-level overview before diving into setup or packages.
